s.text: All papers note that Los Alamos physicist Wen Ho Lee was fired in March after allegedly transferring classified computer files to his own computer.

The papers print virtually identical stories about CIA Director George Tenet's revokation of the security clearance of his predecessor, John M. Deutch, for transferring classified material to an unsecure PC at his home.
A WP front-pager continues the review of the U.S.'s strike on the Sudan in retaliation for the embassy bombings.
